creator: Alexander Terp
description:
* error if invalid enum string used for e.g. named arg in function that will be unrecognized, etc.
* arg default doesn't match constraint e.g. regex/index/enum
* referencing undefined identifiers
    * undefined variable
    * unknown function
* Incorrect ordering e.g. something before file header, args block, etc.
title: RAD-184: More RLS Diagnostics
